General.Name: Iris Clothings Limited
General.Description: Iris Clothings Limited engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of readymade garments in India. The company offers dresses, tops, T-shirts, shorts, trousers, loungewear/nightwear sets, and accessories for infants, toddlers, boys, girls, women, and men. It sells its products under the DoReMe and Oxcgen brand names. Iris Clothings Limited was founded in 2004 and is based in Howrah, India.
